short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Táto fičúra Vám pomože dat na fullscreen aj to čo by ísť nemalo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps bringing the first Video-element on a website to fullscreen even if the website videoplayer has this option hidden. 

Finds video and makes it fullscreen.
